value: content=An art gallery run by a Medfield resident. Displays several pieces of fine art that can be purchased.
content=One of the oldest houses in the United States.

content=Open every Sunday 2pm-5pm, June-September. Appointments can also be made by contacting Medfield Historical Society. Rebuilt in 1680 after being burnt down by Native American raids the Peak house is one of the oldest houses in the region.

content=No longer in use for medical practices the hospital has been used for the filming of the movies, "Shutter Island" and "The Box". Located on the outskirts of town the hospital grounds are also home to many scenic views.

content=Open June-August. The Gazebo hosts musical performances by local bands every Thursday night, and drama productions periodically throughout the summer. Past performances include MacBeth, Twelfth Night, Romeo and Juliet, and Love Letters.
is a 491 acre reservation in the northeast part of town. The property has 6.5 miles of nature trails for hiking or biking, a few ponds for fishing, and open space for picnics and barbeques.
is the highest point in Medfield at 370 feet with a trail to its peak. There are a total of 4.5 miles of trails around the hill and offer views of the hills of Walpole and Norfolk.

content=one of the longer river in the state of Massachusetts. The river winds through the town providing many area to go fishing. The Charles River is also a popular place to go canoeing. Best boating entrance located on Rt. 27 on the Medfield-Sherborn border.

content=Open since the 1950's Lords Department Store sells everything from clothes, school supplies, cards, and toys. There is also an old fashion diner located in the back of the store that serves sandwiches, burgers, and many different kinds of milkshakes.
content=Locally owned clothing store that sells designer cloths at reduced prices.
content=Marshalls is a store that offers current-season, brand name, and designer goods for men, women, teens and children at incredible prices.
content=A locally owned business that offers unique jewelry.
content=Open since the 1950’s, A&D Appliance Center is a family-owned discount appliance store.
content=Serves breakfast all day and is known for its great service and delicious meals.
content=Formally known as Dylan’s, Honey’s is a cafe and Bakery that offers a variety of morning treats and sandwiches.
content=Largest sandwich branch with more than 34,00 locations. It is the leading choice of nutritious sandwiches and meals.
content=A bakery that offers a large selection of baked goods and custom cakes.
content=A Chinese restaurant that offers buffet style dining. Delivery and Catering available.
content=Serves pizza, calzones, subs,sandwiches, and salads. Free delivery with orders over $8.00.
content=Serves pizza, subs, and pasta. Delivery available and dining room open for guests who want to eat there.
content=Open Mon-Thurs 10am-8pm, Fri-Sat 10am-9am.Italian deli that serves sandwiches and pizza. Also sells meats and cheeses. Delivery available.
content=Wide selection of fresh bagels and coffee every morning. Other pastries/cakes are also available.
content=Open everyday at 11am. Serves all kinds of fish, steaks, burgers, salads, pastas, and soups. Bar open daily with flat screen televisions on the walls.

content=Dining Room open: Su-M 5:30PM-9PM, Tu-Sa 5:30PM-10PM. Bar Open: Su-M 4:30PM-9PM, Tu-Th 4:30PM-11PM, F-Sa 4:30PM-midnight. Known for large assortment of dessert pastries, as well as alligator ribs, and New York Strip. During summer outside seating is available upon request. Reservations are suggested however, wine bar with large selection open to all guests without reservations while waiting to be seated.
